org.radarcns.management.web.rest

Class SourceTypeResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarcns.management.web.rest.SourceTypeResource

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class SourceTypeResource
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing SourceType.

      • createSourceType

        @PostMapping(value="/source-types")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceTypeDTO> createSourceType(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                           SourceTypeDTO sourceTypeDTO)
                                                                                                                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /source-types : Create a new sourceType.
        Parameters:
        sourceTypeDTO - the sourceTypeDTO to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new sourceTypeDTO, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceType has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • updateSourceType

        @PutMapping(value="/source-types")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceTypeDTO> updateSourceType(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                          SourceTypeDTO sourceTypeDTO)
                                                                                                                   throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        PUT /source-types : Updates an existing sourceType.
        Parameters:
        sourceTypeDTO - the sourceTypeDTO to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated sourceTypeDTO, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceTypeDTO is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the sourceTypeDTO couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

        @GetMapping(value="/source-types")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SourceTypeDTO>> getAllSourceTypes(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        GET /source-types : get all the sourceTypes.
        Parameters:
        pageable - parameters
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of sourceTypes in body

      • getSourceTypes

        @GetMapping(value="/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SourceTypeDTO>> getSourceTypes(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String producer)
        Find the list of SourceTypes made by the given producer
        Parameters:
        producer - The producer
        Returns:
        A list of objects matching the producer

      • getSourceTypes

        @GetMapping(value="/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{model:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SourceTypeDTO>> getSourceTypes(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String producer,
                                                                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String model)
        Find the list of SourceTypes of the given producer and model. Can be multiple since multiple version of a single model can be made.
        Parameters:
        producer - The producer
        model - The model
        Returns:
        A list of objects matching the producer and model

      • getSourceTypes

        @GetMapping(value="/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{model:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{version:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceTypeDTO> getSourceTypes(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String producer,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String model,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String version)
        Find the SourceType of the given producer, model and version
        Parameters:
        producer - The producer
        model - The model
        version - The version
        Returns:
        A single SourceType object matching the producer, model and version

      • deleteSourceType

        @DeleteMapping(value="/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{model:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{version:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteSourceType(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String producer,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String model,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String version)
        DELETE /source-types/:producer/:model/:version : delete the sourceType with the specified producer, model and version
        Parameters:
        producer - The producer
        model - The model
        version - The version
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
